member.name: T:Qhta.MVVM.CommandCenter
member.summary: Static class enables dependency injection and centralized command management.

member.name: M:Qhta.MVVM.CommandCenter.RegisterCommand(System.Object,System.Windows.Input.ICommand,System.Object)
member.summary: Registers a command with the specified ID.

member.name: M:Qhta.MVVM.CommandCenter.GetCommand(System.Object)
member.summary: Gets a registered command by ID.

member.name: M:Qhta.MVVM.CommandCenter.ExecuteCommand(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Execute a registered command by ID with a given parameter. First a command CanExecute method is called. If the result is true, then Execute method is invoked.

member.name: M:Qhta.MVVM.CommandCenter.NotifyCanExecuteChanged(System.Object)
member.summary: Notifies all listeners that a specific command could have changed it's CanExecute state.

member.name: T:Qhta.MVVM.FileCommands
member.summary: Represents a set of commands commonly used in file-based applications.
member.remarks: This enumeration defines basic commands such as and that can be used to represent actions in a Windows application. It is intended for use in scenarios where a standardized set of commands is needed.

member.name: F:Qhta.MVVM.FileCommands.Open
member.summary: Opens a file. A parameter should be of string or type.

member.name: F:Qhta.MVVM.FileCommands.Save
member.summary: Save a file. A parameter should be of type.

member.name: T:Qhta.MVVM.FileOpenData
member.summary: Structure used as a parameter to file open command.

member.name: M:Qhta.MVVM.FileOpenData.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Structure used as a parameter to file open command.

member.name: P:Qhta.MVVM.FileOpenData.ReadOnly
member.summary: Optional flag indicating whether the file is to be opened in read-only mode.

member.name: T:Qhta.MVVM.IFileSaveData
member.summary: Structure used as a parameter to file save command.

member.name: P:Qhta.MVVM.IFileSaveData.DataObject
member.summary: Data object to save

member.name: P:Qhta.MVVM.IFileSaveData.Filename
member.summary: Filename to save to. If null, a file dialog should be shown.

member.name: P:Qhta.MVVM.IFileSaveData.UseDialog
member.summary: Optional flag indicating whether to perform "Save As" operation.

member.name: T:Qhta.MVVM.QuestCommands
member.summary: Enumeration of command identifiers used in the Quest application.

member.name: F:Qhta.MVVM.QuestCommands.Import
member.summary: Imports data from a spreadsheet file into the application.
member.remarks: This method supports common spreadsheet formats such as .xlsx and .csv. Ensure that the file is not open in another application to avoid access issues.

member.name: T:Qhta.MVVM.WindowOpenData

member.summary: Name of the window

member.summary: Title of the window

member.summary: An optional owner of the window to be opened.

member.summary: Optional class identifier for the window to be opened.

member.summary: Optional X coordinate for the window to be opened.

member.name: P:Qhta.MVVM.WindowOpenData.Top
member.summary: Optional Y coordinate for the window to be opened.

member.name: P:Qhta.MVVM.WindowOpenData.Width
member.summary: Optional X size for the window to be opened.

member.name: P:Qhta.MVVM.WindowOpenData.Height
member.summary: Optional Y size for the window to be opened.

member.name: P:Qhta.MVVM.WindowOpenData.State
member.summary: Initial state of the window to be opened. Can be an enum value of e.g. System.Windows.WindowState.

member.name: T:Qhta.MVVM.WindowsCommands
member.summary: Represents a set of commands commonly used in Windows-based applications.
member.remarks: This enumeration defines basic commands such as and that can be used to represent actions in a Windows application. It is intended for use in scenarios where a standardized set of commands is needed.

member.name: F:Qhta.MVVM.WindowsCommands.OpenWindow
member.summary: Opens a window. A parameter should be of type.

member.summary: Closes a window. A parameter should be a window instance.
